subject: Regarding your recent purchase
body:
Dear customer,

Thank you for your recent purchase. We hope you are enjoying our product. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
John

subject: Invitation to our annual conference
body:
Dear colleague,

We are pleased to invite you to our annual conference. The event will take place on [date] at [location]. We have an exciting lineup of speakers and networking opportunities. We hope to see you there!

Best regards,
Jane

subject: Job opportunity at our company
body:
Dear candidate,

We are currently hiring for a [position] at our company. If you are interested in joining our team, please review the attached job description and submit your application by [deadline]. We look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Alex
